review: Ok it's odd but we decided to cancel our cable and purchase this Fire stick...and...ok.....it's  worth the $39 all day long. The remote isn't worth the roll of toilet paper in your bathroom (batteries die every week and/or its just disconnected) so down load the Amazon Fire TV remote app on your phone/tablet it's just as easy and actually more reliable. I've found so many great shows (alpha house etc) miniseries(John Adams) ,and movies and everything in between I cannot believe I ever paid $100 /mo for cable ....Amazon does it again....just fix the damn remote.
